posts.post_content:
Dear Wizards of The Coast,
  
for god's sake, bring it back.
  
Nothing in MtG today can worth the face of my oponent when I bounce his very only land in the turn 1. We, azure mages, zephyr mages and Teferi's followers, are already w/o [counterspeell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=counterspeell).
  
Please, have mercy, and bring boomerang back.

posts.post_content:
I'm contemplating trading this to a pal o' mine. See, he's got this amazingly fun blue deck that makes it so no one attacks him or whoever he chooses.  
  
Just so you have an idea, he has 3 [flood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=flood)s, 2 [Somnophore](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Somnophore)s, and 4 [Propaganda](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Propaganda)s (pronouced "Proagurdurdur", according to him).  
  
Now I don't know if I should trade him this, since it'll make his deck ever more annoying.   
  
However, he does have a nice [Strategy, Schmategy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Strategy, Schmategy) I've been eyeing for a while... maybe he'll part ways with it...
